Question: In a 2007 biography, this person claims that he was abused as a child by his mother and stepfather, John Cederquist.
Hints: This person appeared in a prominent recurring role as villainous software magnate Ted Roark on the NBC spy-comedy Chuck.
This person guest-starred as an anti-Semitic murder suspect in "In Vino Veritas", the November 3, 2006 episode of Law & Order.
This person starred in the NBC sitcom Community, as aging moist-towelette tycoon Pierce Hawthorne, whom he has played since 2009.
